  <style>
    /* CSS to scale iframe to 80% width of the screen and scale down contents by 75% */
    iframe {
      width: 80vw; /* Set iframe width to 80% of viewport width */
      height: calc(60vw * 0.75); /* Calculate iframe height to maintain aspect ratio and scale down by 75% */
      max-width: 100%; /* Limit iframe width to not exceed 100% of parent container */
      transform: scale(0.75); /* Scale down the contents by 75% */
      transform-origin: top left; /* Set the origin point of the scaling */
    }
  </style>
